name: Debug Snake - Normal Edition
description:
Game i made for #LOWREZJAM 2018! (Check out submission What The Pixel Edition) Normal Edition has more detailed artwork and mechanics.

DONT LET THE BUGS TOUCH YOU!

SMASH PAINT CANS! ONLY LEFT OVER PAINT KILL'S BUGS!

You play as a.... well snake with your mission being to rid the screen of bugs while also collecting as many paint cans as you can. silly, non-logical fun. if successful, i will expand the game and make more levels if the interest is there!

Arrow keys to move

Hold S to shoot Broken Code (Black Squares that spawn enemies)

The goal is to reach a score of 1000+ and kill 10 bugs! Gain points from killing bugs,  smashing paint cans (touch them to release bug paint traps) and shoot broken code.

The only thing that can kill the bugs is the paint left over from smashing the paint cans!

Have a fun experience and comment your thoughts!
